website_summaries.verdict: This attractive magnetic bracelet from Earth Therapy is easy to coordinate with your existing jewelry.
pros: Pure copper cuff-style bracelet with rope inlay
2-tone color gives you more matching options
May provide relief from pain due to arthritis, broken bones, Raynaud's syndrome, carpal tunnel problems
cons: Bends easily, but this makes it easier to adjust

customer_reviews.title: It works however not very durable
customer_reviews.text: It's very pretty and feminine. It works, however, the copper is starting to peel and the braiding decorations on the bracelet have lifted from the bracelet itself :( For something you're supposed to wear daily, I would have hoped for it to last longer than 4 months
customer_reviews.author: Kat McReynolds

customer_reviews.title: Too big for small wrist
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty bracelet, but useless for a person with small wrists. It does not fit well at all, even after bending to try and make it fit a smaller shape. I think this product would be much better if they differentiated between wrist sizes instead of trying to make a botched "one shape fits all" model.
customer_reviews.author: C. McCorvey

customer_reviews.title: Cut my skin
customer_reviews.text: I wore the bracelet for no more than 3 days and it was fine until yesterday I got a cut when I tried to scratch my back with my hand. Noticed one of the bracelets end is super sharp and wasn’t smooth out properly. I have a huge scratch on my back. I do love this bracelet as I have lupus and I think it may be helping my pain in joints. It quite sure yet as I only wore it for few days. I would love to get a replacement that does not have a sharp edge.
customer_reviews.author: Sani

customer_reviews.title: Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: My basal joint arthritis in thumb and hand hurt so much that I literally could not use them. I ordered this bracelet and after wearing it one day I noticed a big improvement. I now wear it constantly and my pain and range of motion are 90% improved. I'm pleased with the quality. I swim in ocean and chlorinated pool and it has not deteriorated, nor does it put off the unpleasant copper odor that another brand did.
customer_reviews.author: Nosenabook

customer_reviews.title: Interesting
customer_reviews.text: two days wearing it, and I noticed the pain in my hands diminished (carpal tunnel). I was taking tylenol but I hate taking any pills. I'll continue wearing it to see how long it lasts. Very interesting.
customer_reviews.author: Moonrisings

customer_reviews.title: Lovely.  Doesn't discolor.
customer_reviews.text: I really can't say how well this works for arthritic pain - the pain I was having in my wrist and hand subsided before I received this bracelet. However, the bracelet itself is very attractive. I have been wearing it for about a week, including in the shower, and it has stayed as lovely and shiny as when I first put it on and there isn't a hint of green or any other discoloration on me or the bracelet. It's very easy to adjust to adjust to fit any size wrist. It's flexible but no so flexible that it loses shape or size while being worn. I think it's a steal of a deal.
customer_reviews.author: MaryB

customer_reviews.title: So Pretty
customer_reviews.text: It's very attractive and it seems to be working. My ankle stopped hurting right away and it is on my wrist! I thought I might have to get an ankle bracelet out of copper to stop the pain, but this works. I don't know if it is the copper or the magnets or a combination of both, but I really love it. My friend wants one just cause it is so pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Lori A. Wilhide

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but turns green....
customer_reviews.text: Liked the look but after wearing it for a month now my wrist is turning a green color, as is the underside of the band, I cleaned it but it came back. Also I know copper is a soft metal so it goes out of shape easily when you take it off ...very disappointed really liked it like I said.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: It is a pretty bracelet
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing this item consistently since it's arrival a week ago, but have seen no difference regarding my arthritis inflamation or pain level. Having had accupuncture in the past and gaining the ability to sleep better from that therapy, I was hoping the magnets in this bracelet would somehow balance my internal electricity and let me sleep more soundly. Alas, this has not happened, either. However, I'll continue to wear it in hopes that maybe it just takes a longer time for the effects to be noticeable. At least it's pretty. BTW... it is quite large.
customer_reviews.author: A. White

customer_reviews.title: Where has this bracelet been all my life?
customer_reviews.text: I can definitely tell a big difference in the arthritis pain overall but I have to mention the compliments I have received for the attractive bracelet! When I mention that it has magnets & the cooper also helps decrease my arthritis pain, they want to know where I got it! I have even purchased another for a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Gail Foster Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Yo it actually works! I was a skeptic but after wearing this for a few months, I'm amazed!! Finally my carpal tunnel doesn't bug me, keeping me awake at night. Yeah, the pain is still there when I'm rough on it but the difference is astounding! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kait Brook

customer_reviews.title: I felt tingling
customer_reviews.text: Wow! what beauty . Within 15 to 20 mins having this bracelet placed on my right hand I felt this tingling. At times it comes and go. It is not an uncomfortable feeling at all.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Ocasio

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and natural relief from pain
customer_reviews.text: My wrist was really hurting and I didn't really believe in the idea of having copper and earth magnates would help, but within a few days, the pain was gone. The bracelet is stylish and does not turn my skin green.
customer_reviews.author: Hilda V. Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Love the design
customer_reviews.text: I like the style of it and have only been wearing it for a few days. Seems I have less pain in that area on my wrist. So hoping it continues to help me.
customer_reviews.author: Ridgehaven

customer_reviews.title: I like the look & I think it’s working
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wearing this for almost 2 weeks and I have to say that the pain in my right arm which I’ve had for 2 years has minimized. Haven’t had to constantly apply ultra strength BenGay. My overall aches lessened for sure. Maybe a placebo, but we’ll see. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Janice W

customer_reviews.title: It also is extremely comfortable and pliable to conform to any position of my ...
customer_reviews.text: This "pure copper" bracelet is not only attractive, but it is helping with pain management of my fractured wrist. It also is extremely comfortable and pliable to conform to any position of my lower arm.
customer_reviews.author: david kroger

customer_reviews.title: If not wear it like a fun bracelet
customer_reviews.text: The purpose of buying thr product was to stop the pain. But the pain is still there . Its not satisfying product, what we expected You can try, it might work for you. Every body is different. You can take a chance and gamble $25 on it. If it works, works. If not wear it like a fun bracelet.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Good for seven weeks
customer_reviews.text: I noticed a difference right away when I put this bracelet on; however after I wore it for about seven weeks it started irritating my skin and had to take it off. When I took it off, I did not notice any difference in the way I felt--even after some time went by.
customer_reviews.author: Hyannisgal

customer_reviews.title: The Earth Elegant Pure Copper Rope Inlay Healing Bracelet
customer_reviews.text: The Bracelet is attractive,I bought it for my left wrist as it has been quite sore. And I have been told that these Copper Bracelets can help in easing pain and possibly healing. I have been wearing it 2 weeks all day all night. Also,thank you for the cute little tote that the bracelet came in. Fluffy
customer_reviews.author: Gladys

customer_reviews.title: Bracelet
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for Mom and she loved it!!! The joint pain has gone with the constant use of the bracelet. Plus, the beautiful design makes it look even better.
customer_reviews.author: Martika

customer_reviews.title: good product but beware of amazon prime charging you unknowingly
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the bracelet and its impact on my pain. I had pain in my hip from a motorcycle accident 10 years. It has eased up greatly. Just beware ..... watch the box that is checked for amazon prime trial. you need to uncheck it if you don't want it. I was charged $119 to my bank account to my surprise. I did call and talked to a nice lady that ordered a refund but it could of all been avoided.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: All i can say is that this thing works for me and my mom. The pain in my knuckles are really gone. Some times I may get a very mild pain but it does not last long.
customer_reviews.author: Henrik Voskanian

customer_reviews.title: Attractive without being flashy
customer_reviews.text: Attractive and unobtrusive. I am not a flashy jewelry kind of person. I found this bracelet attractive, without being gaudy. I have not worn it long enough to speak for the magnet benefit, but overall, I am pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Sad face
customer_reviews.text: I brought 2 of these for my carpal tunnel, I've been wearing them for about a week and no improvement yet,
customer_reviews.author: selina

customer_reviews.title: Well so far so good, this bracelet is working great for my arthritis ...
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from arthritis and carpal tunnel, so I thought I try something different instead of taking pain meds all the time. Well so far so good, this bracelet is working great for my arthritis and carpal tunnel. I am able to type and do other things with less stiffness and pain.I will recommend this product. Also I love the style and the look of this bracelet. Kudos to Earth Therapy!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. AR

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't stay rounded when trying to make it fit. I didn't feel it helped my RA pain at all. Wasted $$.
customer_reviews.author: Kbh

customer_reviews.title: Product is fine, but I was charged reg. Price.  No lightning deal discount. Sad
customer_reviews.text: It fits fine on my large wrist but I paid twice as much as I should have. I got it on a lightning deal (there were hours left) but I was not given a discount at checkout like they said I would. Hope they will fix this as I do like the product and would maybelike to buy my husband one too.
customer_reviews.author: Sueso

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful quality bracelet
customer_reviews.text: This bracelet is so elegant and beautiful. It is high quality and goes with any outfit. I'm hoping it will also help with possible arthritis type pains. I have small wrists and this bracelet was easy to size down to fit me and still keep its shape. But it would fit easily on larger wrists as well. I love it and would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: jlecroy79

customer_reviews.title: This bracelet has been amazing for my migraines
customer_reviews.text: This bracelet has been amazing for my migraines. I was easily having 15-20 per month and now I’m having 2-3. I’ve been wearing it around the clock for 2months. The only reason I give it 4 stars is because it’s starting to tarnish and turn me green. But I just ordered another one. Best find ever!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Hankus

customer_reviews.title: Lovely copper bracelet, very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived timely and well packaged in a pretty bag. I'm experiencing some arthritic pain in my hands and I've heard that wearing copper helps. Not sure if it's working, but I can say that there are days were the pain is not as bad when I first wake up. So, maybe only time will tell. But it's pretty and I wear it every day even sleep with it. It's very comfortable. It's copper and it can't hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Pichuza49

customer_reviews.title: Really helped
customer_reviews.text: I could tell a difference in pain within a short time of putting it on. Ordered one for family member
customer_reviews.author: BnShiloh

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and Functional! Love it
customer_reviews.text: Works well for swelling and pain in wrist and hand.... I am quite impressed since I was skeptical. I would buy it again and in fact will be. A friend wore it a couple of days and wants one so I told her to keep it and I would order another. It's inexpensive and doesn't look so industrial as many others with the same therapeutic intent.
customer_reviews.author: SCUBAsabre

customer_reviews.title: Pain alleviated within hours
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for sudden wrist pain I began experiencing. After only a few hours it was feeling better! I was so surprised because I can be skeptical! The quality is great too!
customer_reviews.author: ACustomer

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas gift so I can't attest to the pain reliving properties, but the bracelet is very pretty and looks well made. It came sealed in a plastic bag, and inside a very nice black velvet pouch. Makes a nice looking gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Brown

customer_reviews.title: Helps with CMC Osteoarthritis
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 bracelets to help with my bilateral CMC thumb osteoarthritis. They definitely take the edge off the pain! I only issue I have is trying to remove and clasp the bracelets because both of my thumbs have arthritis. Overall though, I'm so glad I have these bracelets to ease the pain and allow my hands to function better.
customer_reviews.author: AC

customer_reviews.title: Love this bracelet
customer_reviews.text: This bracelet is very pretty. It does not turn my wrist green. I honestly cannot say if it helps my arthritis but I have noticed that if I go a couple of days without wearing it, my pain increases.
customer_reviews.author: Terry S.

customer_reviews.title: It is beautiful. I have a small wrist and I was ...
customer_reviews.text: It is beautiful. I have a small wrist and I was able to easily bend it to fit my wrist. I have arthritis in my hands and hip and got it after seeing several of my patients wearing various bracelets on their wrist for pain. I did not expect it to help my hip pain but so far my hip pain is greatly improved since wearing the bracelet; I had been putting muscle rub on my hip and taking ibuprofen and not used any of that recently and it was even raining today.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Magnetic Therapy Bracelet Works for Me
customer_reviews.text: This bracelet is a beautiful piece of workmanship. I just recently began wearing the bracelet for arthritis conditions in my elbow and after only a short time I'm already noticing an improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Andie & Ella’s GMa

customer_reviews.title: Not effective
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a gift for my grandmother because of her arthritis. It’s pretty, but didn’t have any affect on her pain.
customer_reviews.author: erica

customer_reviews.title: It looks very elegant and is easy to get on and off
customer_reviews.text: It looks very elegant and is easy to get on and off. I don't have a lot of pain, but every once in a while, I feel a bit of a twinge in thumb area and have not since I've been wearing this bracelet. I would recommend this to anyone and it arrived very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: N. Klass

customer_reviews.title: Could get it to fit correctly!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t fit on wrist correctly. Had to bend on both ends a few times to fit closely to wrist and wound up being to tight. Moved up and down a bit but never could get proper fit.
customer_reviews.author: Tzonni

customer_reviews.title: Great deal, affordable and pretty
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bracelet, flexible enough to custom fit to my arm. I haven't had it long enough to report benefits regarding arthritis pain alleviation, but I THINK I notice a positive difference. I rated five stars because of the quality, appearance, fit, affordability, and speed of transaction.
customer_reviews.author: Amye Slate

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: My carpal tunnel syndrome it significantly reduce when i wear this bracelet. I have removed it and compared the difference without it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and helping, maybe?
customer_reviews.text: Seems to help. Bought only one to see if it'd help with my hands going numb and swelling. I don't know if it's a placebo affect or if it really helped. Wish I'd have been able to bundle two for a discount but I think it's worth the money to buy another :)
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Caused my skin to swell and turn green and burn
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful to look at but caused me pain.
customer_reviews.text: The bracelet is beautiful but after wearing it a couple hours I got terrible deep pains in my wrist and it went up my forearm. I am a nurse and work on a cardiac unit. I changed wrists and in about 1/2 hour the same thing happened in the wrist I changed to. I gave the bracelet to another nurse and the same thing happened to her. A third nurse took it home a wore it overnight and said so far it was ok and did not give her any pain. I loved the look, it's very pretty but I won't wear it again. I gave it away.
customer_reviews.author: Sj

customer_reviews.title: The quality of the bracelet is excellent. Have not had issues with arm discoloring at ...
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the bracelet is excellent. Have not had issues with arm discoloring at this point. Company provides excellent information on their website about using magnets for health. Would definitely order again!
customer_reviews.author: beckie

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bracelet! It is rich looking, it is comfortable, & helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Gladys Crarey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the texture and design. Very pretty and easy to wear.
customer_reviews.author: marilyn belt

customer_reviews.title: Stylist
customer_reviews.text: I gave myself a present for Christmas and now wearing the Purse Copper Magnetic Therapy bracklet. My friends have noticed it as well and think it is great!
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty. I've had many compliments on it! Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Beckineagle

customer_reviews.title: ehh.
customer_reviews.text: I did not feel any relief with this bracelet. a friend of mine suggested using magnets to help with my arm and neck pain so I tried it and have not had any relief with this. Maybe the magnets aren't strong enough
customer_reviews.author: ll

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, gift for my wife and mother in law, both are very pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Cedar Creek

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Bracelet arrived promptly and it is very pretty. You would never know it was anything but a pretty bracelet. I have not had it but a few days but I am hoping it really makes a difference in my pain level.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Q

customer_reviews.title: The bracelet is absolutely beautiful! I get compliments on it daily
customer_reviews.text: The bracelet is absolutely beautiful! I get compliments on it daily. I have had it 1 week so am unsure of any benefits yet for my arthritis, but am hoping!
customer_reviews.author: Brenna A.

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I like this bracelets. I found it works well for my wrist and the arthritis I have. It looks pretty but I can see this one on a man as well. I think it works well. I love my bracelet.
customer_reviews.author: thomas burdg

customer_reviews.title: but I feel better. And it is a nice looking bracelet
customer_reviews.text: I know there is no science behind it, but in the two months I have worn it, I haven't had to ice my thumb. I still get some twangs of pain, usually when rain is in the vicinity, and it may be all in my head, but I feel better. And it is a nice looking bracelet.
customer_reviews.author: LCampbell

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love the style
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the style. It is very fashionable to wear with either silver or gold. Plus, it really helped with the Epicondylitis I was diagnosed with!
customer_reviews.author: Paige Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Relieve wrist pain
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife who was experiencing sever pain in her right wrist for several days. Within hours after putting it on the pain went from a 10 to a 1 very good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Norman Haglind

customer_reviews.title: Great for my osteoarthritis!
customer_reviews.text: You will not believe me but I have osteoarthritis of the hands & felt tons better when I put this on! I will buy more!
customer_reviews.author: rosemary Mckeever

customer_reviews.title: Received beautiful bracelet quickly
customer_reviews.text: Received beautiful bracelet quickly. Nicely packaged. Included link to informative e-book. I have a small wrist, so my husband had to bend it to make it smaller, but it is very sturdy and looks lovely.
customer_reviews.author: San Antonio Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty sure this helps! My claw hasn't been freezing up like it used to!
customer_reviews.author: kathleen murphy

customer_reviews.title: It's so pretty!
customer_reviews.text: This bracelet is wonderful! It's very pretty and easy to wear and, most importantly, when I wear it I feel less arthritic pain I. My thumbs and wrists. I try to wear it for at least a couple of hours each day. Thank you for making such a stylist therapy item.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Vogt

customer_reviews.title: Not feeling benefits but it's a nice bracelet.
customer_reviews.text: I've worn the bracelet for over a week and not really feeling any effects of pain relief. It's pretty and well made. I'll continue to wear it to see how it works over time.
customer_reviews.author: Beogg

customer_reviews.title: Can't use with insulin pump
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful bracelet but I cannot wear it because I wear an insulin pump per the Medtronic company.
customer_reviews.author: Beagle Fan

customer_reviews.title: but I have been happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I don't really believe in this sort of medicine, but I really do think it has helped my wrist. I cannot say if it would help everyone, but I have been happy with it, and it looks very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and feels great
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and feels great. It also comes with a small soft pouch so my mom won't lose it as easily when not wearing it. No medical proof yet that it works but what the heck it's worth a try to me.
customer_reviews.author: Bigphal

customer_reviews.title: Love this bracelet. Very feminine!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the bracelet. Very attractive. Nicely packaged. Would definitely buy from this company again. Have worn it every day since it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: The bracelet arrived promptly and is just as beautiful as expected. I bought it as a gift for my mother-in-law because she has arthritis. Not sure yet if it will work bc she just received it but regardless, it's a pretty bracelet and compliments her other jewelry she wears.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Woodruff

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: I've worn it for 2-3 weeks so ready to comment! It's sleek (small wrist so a perfect fit) and good looking. There's no dark coloring on my wrist so maybe I don't need the copper...but it looks and fits great!
customer_reviews.author: Paige Spires

customer_reviews.title: The most beautiful copper bracelets around
customer_reviews.text: The most beautiful copper bracelets I've been able to find - my wife loved her's so much she asked me to get another one! They look a lot like Black Hills gold. Lovely!
customer_reviews.author: SierraMister

customer_reviews.title: Great product and at a great price if you are thinking of trying copper and magnetic jewelry!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two for my mom for her shoulder pain. She said she started feeling a tingle in her hands after five minutes. She's been sleeping with them on and said she's noticed less pain in her shoulders. Thank you for a great product at a fantastic price. We were looking at ones that weren't as pretty and twice the price!
customer_reviews.author: Rose Silva

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Beautiful design and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Beautiful design and great quality. It does relieve the "ache" in my knuckles and wrist. Hands down, great buy!
customer_reviews.author: BK - Walled Lake, MI

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this bracelet. It works. I want to order another one..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Really nice and seems effective . My pain seems a bit better when I wear it. And what is most important it is really pretty. I never use bracelets so this one serves two functions. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Macbeth

customer_reviews.title: The item arrived on estimated delivery date, exactly as ...
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived on estimated delivery date, exactly as described and it addapts well on the wrist.For the time being I cannot appreciate the announced effects, but I hope that they will be as described.
customer_reviews.author: Mirela Faur

customer_reviews.title: Elegant Magnetic Copper Bracelet
customer_reviews.text: So stylish! I have it on 24/7. I have ordered another bracelet plus rings for my pain issues.
customer_reviews.author: LibbyB

customer_reviews.title: it is very beautiful and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: As I can not really testify to the health benefits, it is very beautiful and very comfortable. I wear it every day!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Davis

customer_reviews.title: But it is a pretty bracelet.
customer_reviews.text: Still in the testing stage. I don't know if it's working or not. But it is a pretty bracelet.
customer_reviews.author: pamh

customer_reviews.title: Pleased
customer_reviews.text: The bracelet was packaged very well. It has an attractive design that is much prettier than the plain copper bracelets. It does help relieve my arthritis pain.
customer_reviews.author: R.S.E.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as pictured, and love it
customer_reviews.text: I have received many compliments on this braclet, and even better it's helping with arthritis. By no means does it take the pain away completely, but it is much more tolerable than it ever has been. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SLB

customer_reviews.title: It really does help. My fingers are not stiff ...
customer_reviews.text: It really does help. My fingers are not stiff when I get up. I even ordered another one so I can have one on each hand.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy A. Knight

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice bracelet, it's well made and very affordable. I wear it every day, I have not wrist pain when I wear it. Yes I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Poeschel

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: High quality piece. Lovely and does seem to help with my circulation in my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and feel of it and I do believe it helps with my athritis
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit properly
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my granddaughter but she didn't like how it felt, it was to uncomfortable on her wrist having to bend it out of shape in order for it to fit properly.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Moretti

customer_reviews.title: Give the result
customer_reviews.text: I really can say, it relief pain and my girlfriend tried and she was amazed on how just a bracelet can do. Why don't you try?
customer_reviews.author: keit

customer_reviews.title: Love this! I cant believe how much it has ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I cant believe how much it has helped my arthritis and the numbness and tingling in left arm due to bulging discs in neck. Highly recommend bracelet and seller!!! Prompt shipping!!!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Porter

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This bracelet is very attractive and despite my initial skepticism, seems to be helping with the pain in my thumb. It has not turned green and continues to shine after a few weeks of continuous wear. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Ann G.

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous copper bracelet with 6 magnets. Bought if for ...
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous copper bracelet with 6 magnets. Bought if for arthritis relief, but my headaches have also subsided. Coincidence? Maybe...maybe not.
customer_reviews.author: Lita Blevins

customer_reviews.title: you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Since I began wearing this bracelet my tendonitis has greatly improved. I could not bend my ring finger for 2 years before purchasing this bracelet. Buy it, you won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Rosanne

customer_reviews.title: Don't throw away your pain meds...
customer_reviews.text: Did NOT provide any relief; looks ok for a piece of cheap jewelry.
customer_reviews.author: Bonita Wink

customer_reviews.title: Love Love this been wearing it for 10 days now ...
customer_reviews.text: Love Love this been wearing it for 10 days now and my thumb is almost pain free. I would recommend this to anyone in pain.
customer_reviews.author: Betty French

customer_reviews.title: Cannot guarantee the medicinal value but have not been awakened ...
customer_reviews.text: Cannot guarantee the medicinal value but have not been awakened with night pain since wearing it. I also bought a small plain one and I wear both.
customer_reviews.author: Erna

customer_reviews.title: Cute jewelry
customer_reviews.text: I like it! Not sure it works for my pain! It’s a cute bracelet to wear!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: and will like. Would buy this again if I lost it
customer_reviews.text: attractive, durable, and will like. Would buy this again if I lost it, knock on wood
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Annoyed
customer_reviews.text: The edge of the metal gets caught has a rough raw edge.
customer_reviews.author: Sia

customer_reviews.title: but my sore arthritic thumbs feel better.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if it's the placebo effect, but my sore arthritic thumbs feel better.
customer_reviews.author: Carl McFarland’s wife

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize I couldn't use it with my insulin pump. Got stuck for return shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Pat H.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Bracelet
customer_reviews.text: I just received the bracelet. It is lovely and great quality. As for how it helps therapeutically, I haven't worn it long enough to see. But I certainly hope it helps.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Zimmer
